nodes.text: Bothawui Jewellers was a jewelry business that operated on the floating mining colony of Cloud City in the atmosphere of the planet Bespin, at some point between the years 1 ABY and 3 ABY. The business was run by a married Bothan couple, Henna and Cidri, and named for the Bothan homeworld of Bothawui. The two jewellers ran their operation out of a weathered JumpMaster 5000 starship, which they set up on Market Row, a commercial corridor located within the Port Town district of Cloud City.

Bothawui Jewellers first appeared in The Jewel of Yavin, an adventure module released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. The jewellers is listed as a vendor that players can purchase goods from, but no specific interactions are listed.
